Topic.Title: If you watched CNBC would you want to invest in this market ??

Message.Msg: I stopped watching CNBC a long time ago and switched to Bloomberg. Sadly, CNBC has become a right-wing political channel instead of a financial news channel. Bloomberg isn't perfect, but they don't infect the financial news with political views to the extent that CNBC does.

Topic.Title: If you watched CNBC would you want to invest in this market ??

Message.Msg: CNBC turns everything into a crisis for effect.

Message.Title: Read INTC story pretty sure it will be the same as IBM
Message.Msg: Intel (IBM) Beats on Earnings, Revenue Falls Short Intel Corp (IBM) forecast current-quarter revenue that was slightly below expectations as computer industry grapples with falling sales They will talk about backlog .
